constructor.details: The currentRate is used for the calculation of rewards, at the start of the users count, the currentRate is set to the _initialRate.

params._initialRate: initial rate the user earned for every song listened to, at an average 2.5min/song
params._token: Address of the token being earned

registerUser().details: A registeration fee is included after we get to a 1000 users **THIS IS OPTIONAL**the internal function, check and update is implemented when we meet the functions conditions

rewardUser(address).custom:listeningtime: is calculated by subtracting the user's lastListeningTime from the current block.timestamp. This gives us the duration of the current listening session.
rewardUser(address).details: Users funds are forwarded,state is updated, only a registered user can earn rewards. Use require to revert state if conditions arent metchecks if the accumulatedListening time is greater than the listeningTime Threshold, if true, then checks for the lastime reward was sent, it its been upto a week

startListening().details: Verification of listening session and Observation of previous session, state is restarted if true. Only user can start listening

withdraw(address).details: allows only register users to withdraw their funds. use require to revert state if conditions arent met.

rewardUser(address).notice: rewards users after all conditions met

startListening().notice: Starts a listening session if the new week's accumulated time is less than threshold
